readme:
# ion-toast-controller

ToastController is a component used to create Toast components. Please see the docs for [Toast](../toast).
docs: ToastController is a component used to create Toast components. Please see the docs for [Toast](../toast).

methods.name: create
methods.docs: Create a toast overlay with toast options.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: options The options to use to create the toast.

methods.name: dismiss
methods.signature: dismiss(data?: any, role?: string | undefined, id?: string | undefined) => Promise<boolean>

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: data Any data to emit in the dismiss events.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: role The role of the element that is dismissing the toast. For example, 'cancel' or 'backdrop'.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: id The id of the toast to dismiss. If an id is not provided, it will dismiss the most recently opened toast.

methods.name: getTop
methods.docs: Get the most recently opened toast overlay.
